Package layouttree

Class LayoutLeaf

java.lang.Object
layouttree.Layout
layouttree.LayoutLeaf
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class LayoutLeaf extends Layout
LayoutLeaf represents the leaf layout-structure LayoutLeaf inherets from Layout

    • rotateRelationshipNeighbor

      public Layout rotateRelationshipNeighbor(ROT_DIRECTION rot_dir)
      Rotates the active layoutLeaf under this structure if there is one with its right neighbor if there is one, clockwise or counterclockwise according to rotdir. If the right neighbor is a direct sibling it rotates to stand perpendicular to the current orientation of the parent. If there is no direct right sibling it is added to the parent of the active leaf and rotated then.
      Specified by:
      rotateRelationshipNeighbor in class Layout

    • closeActive

      public int closeActive()
      Calls forcedCloseActive() on the contained FileBufferView if it's active. Returns 0 if close was succesful and 2 if close was succesful but there are no more other children.
      Specified by:
      closeActive in class Layout
      Returns:

    • forcedCloseActive

      public int forcedCloseActive()
      Calls forcedCloseActive() on the contained FileBufferView if it's active. Returns 0 if close was succesful and 2 if close was succesful but there are no more other children.
      Specified by:
      forcedCloseActive in class Layout
